text.p: PC Quote Inc, a provider of on-line market quotes, said Monday it continues negotiaitons with other strategic investors, after negotiations with Track Data Corp for the sale of its core business to Track were terminated.
The talks with Track were ended by mutual agreement, PC Quote said.
In the meantime, the company has implemented a cost reduction plan designed to improve the bottom line, PC Quote said.
PC Quote shares closed up 2/16 at 1-7/16 Monday.
Track Data shares closed down 1/8 at two.
